description: Now I can control and set up the my HVAC. The set-up was just what I need to start off the logic blocks. For about two and a Half on how I was going to it. If it wasn't software it was hardware. Then I get everthing all set-up-wiredup and program and my hardware and software did not want to talk that. Then I ran into this and got all my logics to run all of my actuator, fan, senors, heatexchangers etc.. I got my wife into programing she got all of our lighting and garage door online and now she is working on the secutity cam's. She went from a Accountant Manager to programing and she blows me out out of the water and I do it for a living. Thank you for giving me and my wife a hobbie we can do together.xs
summary: love it just what we needed11
